com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.provided

Interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicStippledParametersType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2SurfaceShaderBasicStippledParameters

    public interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicStippledParametersType
extends R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
    Parameters for the basic stippled surface shader.

    • Method Summary

      • albedoColor

        default com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI4F<R2SpaceRGBAType> albedoColor()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        The base albedo color for the surface. This value is mixed with values sampled from R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoTexture() based on R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoMix().

        Specified by:
        albedoColor in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The base albedo color of the surface
        See Also:
        R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoTexture(), R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoMix()

      • specularColor

        default com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI3F<R2SpaceRGBType> specularColor()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        The base specular color for the surface. This essentially encodes both the intensity and color of specular highlights for the surface.

        Specified by:
        specularColor in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The base specular color of the surface

      • emission

        default float emission()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        The emission value for the surface, in the range [0.0, 1.0]. The value is typically processed by filters to give surfaces the appearance of emitting light.

        Specified by:
        emission in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The emission value of the surface

      • emissionTexture

        default R2Texture2DUsableType emissionTexture()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        An emission map which is used to modulate the value of R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.emission(). Specifically, values sampled from the map are multiplied by R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.emission() to give per-pixel control of the emission value.

        Specified by:
        emissionTexture in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The emission map for the surface

      • albedoTexture

        default R2Texture2DUsableType albedoTexture()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        An albedo map which is used to modulate the value of R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoColor(). Specifically, values sampled from the map are linearly mixed with R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoColor() based on R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoMix(). The alpha channel of the map is also used so that a texture with transparent sections will show the underlying R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoColor() even when the texture is fully mixed (i.e. R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoMix() == 1.0).

        Specified by:
        albedoTexture in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The albedo map for the surface

      • albedoMix

        default float albedoMix()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        A specification of the mix value between the albedo color and texture. If 0.0, the albedo of the surface will be R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoColor(). If 1.0, the albedo of the surface will be a value sampled from R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.albedoTexture(). Other values in the range [0.0, 1.0] will linearly mix between the two extremes.

        Specified by:
        albedoMix in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The mix between the albedo color and texture

      • specularTexture

        default R2Texture2DUsableType specularTexture()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        A specular map which is used to modulate the value of R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.specularColor(). Specifically, values sampled from the map are multiplied by R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.specularColor() to give per-pixel control of specular intensity and color.

        Specified by:
        specularTexture in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The specular map for the surface

      • specularExponent

        default float specularExponent()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        The specular exponent. This is a value in the range [0.0, 256.0] and is used directly as the exponent term.

        Specified by:
        specularExponent in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The specular exponent

      • normalTexture

        default R2Texture2DUsableType normalTexture()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        A normal map used to peturb normal vectors for the surface. The texture is expected to contain RGB-encoded vectors such that [0.5, 0.5, 1.0] represents the "neutral" tangent-space [0.0, 0.0, 1.0] vector.

        A map containing entirely [0.5, 0.5, 1.0] values will have no visible effect on the surface.

        Specified by:
        normalTexture in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The normal map

      • alphaDiscardThreshold

        default float alphaDiscardThreshold()
        Description copied from interface: R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType

        The alpha discard threshold specifies a lower bound on the opacity of surface pixels. For any given surface pixel, if the opacity of the calculated albedo is less than the R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType.alphaDiscardThreshold(), then the pixel is simply discarded; the pixel is not written to the current geometry buffer. This allows for otherwise opaque surfaces to have fully transparent sections.

        Specified by:
        alphaDiscardThreshold in interface R2SurfaceShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        A discard threshold in the range [0.0, 1.0]

      • stippleNoiseTexture

        R2Texture2DUsableType stippleNoiseTexture()
        The noise texture used to implement stippling. This is a random noise texture that is tiled across the screen, and values in the red channel are sampled for stippling.
        Returns:
        A noise texture
        See Also:
        stippleThreshold()

      • stippleThreshold

        default float stippleThreshold()
        The stipple threshold value. For each pixel in the surface, the stipple threshold determine whether or not that pixel will be discarded. Essentially, the stippleNoiseTexture() is sampled at each pixel, and if the sampled value is less than the threshold value, the pixel is discarded. Consequently, a stipple threshold of 0.0 never discards pixels.
        Returns:
        The threshold value
